name: Ka-Bob PuzzleScript Edition
description:
We had initially explored PuzzleScript as an option for creating our game for GMTK Game Jam 2019. The team opted to go for a more flexible approach to audio and graphics and moved away from PuzzleScript.

After the jam ended, we continued on our journey to explore PuzzleScript as a viable option for game jams and ported our game, Ka-Bob, into PuzzleScript. In some ways, it falls short of the aesthetic that we reached with the original game jam version. In other ways, it's more complete.
